subject: Re: [junit] Recompiling and reloading from GUITestRunner
msgSnippet: ... Well, what s the real issue? Maybe we can come up with a cool solution. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com ::
messageBody:
Chris Morris wrote:

> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> >Well, yes, but you'll have to write that yourself. :)
> >
> >Why do you want the TestRunner to be an IDE, though? Single
> >Responsibility Principle and all that.
> >
> I think I was over-applying the Lazy Programmer Principle :-)

Well, what's the real issue? Maybe we can come up with a cool solution.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services

Let's write software that people understand
